# Battle of the Tech Bands (BOTTB)

> A community charity event where bands made up of technology professionals compete in a live music battle. All proceeds support Youngcare, an Australian charity helping young people with high care needs.

## About

Battle of the Tech Bands is Brisbane's premier tech industry music competition. Technology companies form bands and perform live covers, mashups, and medleys in front of judges and a crowd vote. The event raises money for Youngcare while celebrating the musical talents within the tech community.

## Site Structure

- `/` - Homepage with upcoming events and recent results
- `/events` - List of all past, current, and upcoming events
- `/event/[eventId]` - Individual event page with bands and details
- `/results/[eventId]` - Event results with scores and winner
- `/band/[bandId]` - Individual band page with scores, setlist, photos, and videos
- `/companies` - Browse all participating companies and their bands
- `/photos` - Photo gallery with filters by event, photographer, and company
- `/slideshow/[id]` - Full-screen photo viewer
- `/videos` - Video gallery of performances
- `/songs` - Every song performed across all events
- `/songs/[artist]` - Songs by a specific artist
- `/songs/[artist]/[song]` - Specific song performances
- `/photographers` - Featured event photographers
- `/photographer/[slug]` - Individual photographer portfolio
- `/about` - About BOTTB and Youngcare
- `/faq` - Frequently asked questions

## Key Information

- **Location**: Brisbane, Australia (with expansion to Sydney)
- **Charity**: Youngcare (https://youngcare.com.au)
- **Scoring**: Events use judge scores (Song Choice, Performance, Crowd Vibe) plus crowd voting
- **History**: Running since 2022 with multiple events per year

## Content Types

- **Events**: Live music competitions with multiple bands
- **Bands**: Tech company bands with members, setlists, and performance data
- **Photos**: Professional photography from events
- **Videos**: YouTube performance videos
- **Songs**: Setlist data including covers, mashups, and medleys

## Contact

- Email: info@bottb.com
- Website: https://www.battleofthetechbands.com
